[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@textile/hub](./hub.md) &gt; [Buckets](./hub.buckets.md)

## Buckets class

Buckets is a web-gRPC wrapper client for communicating with the web-gRPC enabled Textile Buckets API.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Buckets 
```

## Example 1

Initialize a the Bucket API

```
import { Buckets } from '@textile/hub'

const buckets = Buckets.withUserAuth(auth)

```

## Example 2

Find an existing Bucket

```
const roots = await buckets.list();
const existing = roots.find((bucket) => bucket.name === 'files')

```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [init(name, ctx)](./hub.buckets.init.md) |  | Initializes a new bucket. |
|  [links(key, ctx)](./hub.buckets.links.md) |  | Returns a list of bucket links. |
|  [list(ctx)](./hub.buckets.list.md) |  | Returns a list of all bucket roots. |
|  [listPath(key, path, ctx)](./hub.buckets.listpath.md) |  | Returns information about a bucket path. |
|  [pullPath(key, path, ctx, opts)](./hub.buckets.pullpath.md) |  | Pulls the bucket path, returning the bytes of the given file. |
|  [pushPath(key, path, input, ctx, opts)](./hub.buckets.pushpath.md) |  | Pushes a file to a bucket path. |
|  [remove(key, ctx)](./hub.buckets.remove.md) |  | Removes an entire bucket. Files and directories will be unpinned. |
|  [removePath(key, path, ctx)](./hub.buckets.removepath.md) |  | Returns information about a bucket path. |
|  [withUserAuth(auth, host, debug)](./hub.buckets.withuserauth.md) | <code>static</code> | Creates a new gRPC client instance for accessing the Textile Buckets API. |
|  [withUserKey(key, host, debug)](./hub.buckets.withuserkey.md) | <code>static</code> | Create a new gRPC client Bucket instance from a supplied key and secret |
